local_intent: Perform a short push of the grasped cloth corner to advance the diagonal fold while maintaining grasp stability.
assumptions: Cloth corner is already grasped and in contact with the table surface
End-effector yaw is set to 45 degrees from prior step
Cloth remains visible to the camera
coherence_with_global: Checks cloth visibility and yaw (45) before executing the push with identical parameters to GLOBAL_BT; verifies grasp stability after push, aligning with the transfer phase preceding Place/Press.
